Ways to Make 2021 Better

 Feb 11, 2021

Feb 11, 2021

We want to help you make 2021 better than 2020. Here’s how we’re doing it.
 

Do you want 2021 to be way better than 2020? We can help make that happen, whether or not you’re interested in buying or selling a home. We decided to do a few unique things for our friends and clients that we’ve never done before. This year, we’ll be hosting four different webinars to start, and you can find out all the information about them by visiting CathysWebinars.com. 

Simply follow the links below to register for the webinars that appeal to you. Here’s a quick rundown of each one:

Balance and Fun in 2021. We feel balance and fun are getting left by the wayside during the pandemic, so having it in our lives right now means you need to be intentional about it. We’ll be using the book “The 12-Week Year” and a planning tool to show you strategies to ensure you get balance and fun back into your life.

Get the Home You Really Want. This one is all about buying and selling a home. This will cover programs that will help you buy and/or sell. 

Get the Most Money for Your Home Sale: Prepare for the Home Inspection. For this webinar, I’ll be partnering with a home inspector to prepare sellers for certain things before they ever list their house. A seller may get many offers immediately, but after the inspection, the buyer could back out because it yielded surprising results. 

10 Things San Antonio Area Landlords Need to Know in 2021. This webinar is great for landlords and those who want to become landlords. Jason and Pete from the Bridgeman Properties Group will join me to discuss evictions, COVID-19 restrictions, the sales market, the rental market, and more.

You can attend these webinars or watch the video replays later if you miss them. These live webinars are completely free, and we’ll have question and answer sessions at the end.

If you have questions about these webinars or anything real estate-related, call or email us. We hope to speak with you soon.

    • About San Antonio


    Cathy Naiser, Realtor Powered X The Castillo Group is a small group of very dedicated real estate agents and operations personnel led by Cathy Naiser. We work with Sellers, Buyers, and Investors and believe that excellent customer service comes from using the best technology and providing the best personal attention. 

    Cathy Naiser has been professionally serving the community in Education and then in Real Estate for over 25 years. After graduation from college, Cathy entered the Convent and became a Catholic Nun. Simultaneously, she began her professional career as a middle school band director. While she remained in the convent for only 4 years, she taught school for 20 years. Most of those years were spent teaching in San Antonio, Texas. After 20 years in the teaching profession, Cathy retired early. She studied real estate investing and began “flipping houses”. She became quite proficient in the real estate investing arena while flipping 23 houses in a 12-month period. In addition to wholesaling houses, she rehabbed houses, purchased rental properties, sold houses “owner financed” and sold notes on houses. 

    During that time, she became a licensed real estate agent. She used her license to help her find and evaluate potential investment properties. Later, she joined Keller Williams and worked to become one of the Top Agents in the company. Her knowledge of real estate throughout the city was vast, and she attracted many buyers, sellers and investors. For 10 years, she has served on the Agent Leadership Council and the Faculty at Keller Williams Realty City View. Because of her high production and service to the community Cathy was named one of the city’s “Platinum Top 50” agent winners for 9 years in a row. 

    She enjoys offering money saving programs to her clients and helping them reach their goals. Her mission (in Real Estate and Life) is to learn, grow, and be the best she can be while positively influencing others and helping them move towards their goals.
